com.artemis

Class ComponentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.ComponentManager

  • @SkipWire
public class ComponentManager
extends BaseSystem
    Handles the association between entities and their components.

    Only one component manager exists per World instance, managed by the world.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

      • getIdentity

        protected int getIdentity(int entityId)
        Fetch composition id for entity. A composition id is uniquely identified by a single Aspect. For performance reasons, each entity is identified by its composition id. Adding or removing components from an entity will change its compositionId.
        Parameters:
        entityId -
        Returns:
        composition identity.

      • getTypeFactory

        public ComponentTypeFactory getTypeFactory()
        Returns:
        Factory responsible for tracking all component types.
